summary.title: Optimize frontend polling intervals
summary.description: Reduced refetchInterval for conversations from 10s to 30s and messages from 5s to 15s, configured React Query with staleTime 10s and disabled refetchOnWindowFocus

changes.description: Changed conversations refetchInterval from 10000ms to 30000ms (10s to 30s)
Changed messages refetchInterval from 5000ms to 15000ms (5s to 15s)
Changed default staleTime from 5 minutes (300000ms) to 10 seconds (10000ms)
Changed refetchOnWindowFocus from conditional (production only) to false (always disabled)
